about_the_game:
This is a graphics optimization module for Luminous Skies: Interstellar that is intended to reduce the strain on older operating systems [similar to the one found for Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure/Horizons].

Note: it is not recommended to have this DLC installed if the player does not also have Luminous Skies: Interstellar installed as well. It won't do anything adverse but it is a waste of hard drive space.

content_descriptors.notes: Shows non realistic depictions of monsters [such as zombies] and things like skeletons of slain people.

name: Luminous Skies: Interstellar Graphics DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Default controls: Keyboard and/or Mouse
